name: The Mystery of Castle Super Beast
storyline:
Woolie is lost. 
 
Waking up in a strange place, with no idea of how he got there, it is up to you to help him on his way home. Guide Woolie through mysterious dangers and mysterious darkness in a mysterious setting. 
 
What a mysterious game! The biggest mystery might be why someone would willingly create a game inspired by the classic survival horror titles, with janky tank controls. 
 
And Pat is also there. You should help him too. 
 
Remember, if you lose in Castle Super Beast you lose in Canada, and if you lose in Canada you lose in real life.
summary: A comedy/horror fangame based on the podcast Castle Super Beast. Styled on tank control PS1 games like Silent Hill and Resident Evil.
